context.description: Context of requests in the manifest file (defaults to the webpack context).

entryOnly.description: If true, only entry points will be exposed (default: true).

format.description: If true, manifest json file (output) will be formatted.

name.description: Name of the exposed dll function (external name, use value of 'output.library').

path.description: Absolute path to the manifest json file (output).

type.description: Type of the dll bundle (external type, use value of 'output.libraryTarget').
